liability-coverage for a replacement-vehicle; if the insured vehicle is not fit for use, the license plates can be transferred to another operationally safe vehicle for a specified amount of time (max. amount insured)

liability-coverage for a replacement-vehicle; if the insured vehicle is not fit for use, the license plates can be transferred to another operationally safe vehicle for a specified amount of time (waiting time in days)

product.motor.coverage.liability.sum-ins.description: liability coverages for vehicles (max. amount insured)

product.motor.coverage.liability.suspens.description: suspension bonus for liability coverage when license plate is deposited (deductible)
suspension bonus for liability coverage when license plate is deposited (option is included in the product)
suspension bonus for liability coverage when license plate is deposited (max. amount insured)
suspension bonus for liability coverage when license plate is deposited (waiting time in days)

product.motor.coverage.liability.waiting.description: liability coverages for vehicles (waiting time in days)

product.motor.coverage.passenger-cover.d.description: passenger cover: accident protection for driver and occupants (deductible)
passenger cover: accident protection for driver in case of selfinflicted accident (deductible)
passenger cover: accident protection for driver in case of selfinflicted accident (option is included in the product)
passenger cover: accident protection for driver in case of selfinflicted accident (max. amount insured)
passenger cover: accident protection for driver in case of selfinflicted accident (waiting time in days)

product.motor.coverage.passenger-cover.i.description: passenger cover: accident protection for driver and occupants (option is included in the product)

passenger cover: accident protection for passengers (option is included in the product)

product.motor.coverage.passenger-cover.w.description: passenger cover: accident protection for driver and occupants (waiting time in days)

product.motor.coverage.replacement-drive.description: coverage of costs for a replacement-driver, who brings the vehicle (and its occupants) home if the driver is not fit to drive after accident (option is included in the product)

product.motor.coverage.replacement-of-sm.description: in case of a breakdown service on site, the replacement of small parts will be reimbursed (deductible)
in case of a breakdown service on site, the replacement of small parts will be reimbursed (option is included in the product)
in case of a breakdown service on site, the replacement of small parts will be reimbursed (max. amount insured)
in case of a breakdown service on site, the replacement of small parts will be reimbursed (waiting time in days)

product.motor.coverage.replacement-vehic.description: motor assistance: replacement vehicle in case the insured vehicle is damaged (deductible)
motor assistance: replacement vehicle in case the insured vehicle is damaged (option is included in the product)
motor assistance: replacement vehicle in case the insured vehicle is damaged (max. amount insured)
motor assistance: replacement vehicle in case the insured vehicle is damaged (waiting time in days)

product.motor.coverage.vat-reimbursement.description: waiver of VAT reimbursement (option is included in the product)

product.motor.coverage.vehicle-assistanc.description: motor assistance for vehicle in case of an accident (deductible)
motor assistance for vehicle in case of an accident (option is included in the product)

motor assistance for vehicle in case of an accident (waiting time in days)

recovery of the vehicle and transport to nearest suitable garage (waiting time in days)

date of issue of the document
license categories wrt 3. EU driver's license directive
loss of document the past (in relevant time-period)

date of issue of the document
loss of document the past (in relevant time-period)

amount of travel activity a person has to do as part of their job (in percent)
